CustomField.description: Calcule la date et heure optimale de rappel en fonction de l'heure de la date de cr√©ation
CustomField.formula:
DATETIMEVALUE(TEXT(YEAR(TODAY()))+'-'+TEXT(MONTH(TODAY()))+'-'+TEXT(DAY(TODAY()))+' '+
MID( TEXT(CreatedDate - 1 ), 12, 2 ) & ":" & MID( TEXT(CreatedDate - 1 ), 15, 2 ) & ":" & MID( TEXT(CreatedDate - 1 ), 18, 2 ))
CustomField.label: Date optimale de rappel
